com.sc.hm.otl.core

Interface OTLInjector<C>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextMapInjector

    public interface OTLInjector<C>
    Injector will be invoked whenever there is an outboud request. The framework will call the injector to inject the tracing information in the outbound request in order to continue the tracing flow. In order to inject the tracing details, it expects an active Span to be present in the current thread context. If no span is present or active at that time, no information will be passed over the wire.
    Author:
    Sudiptasish Chanda

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void inject(C carrier)
      It will call inject(OTLSpanContext, Object) after taking the active span from the current thread context.
      void inject(OTLSpanContext context, C carrier)
      Take the tracing details from the spancontext provided and push them into the carrier, which is tied to the outbound request.
